name: worse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 comparative of
bad : more unpleasant, difficult, or severe than before or than something else that is also bad: worse than The conditions they're living in are worse than we thought.get worse If the rain gets any worse we'll have to go back.even worse His manners are even worse than his sister's.much worse The heat is much worse in the daytime. Opposite
better get worse
B1 to become more ill, or to become a more severe condition: My cold seems to be getting worse.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesI thought the book's writing was dreadful, and its conception even worse.The (traffic) congestion in the city gets even worse during the summer.If the symptoms get worse, consult your doctor.Company losses were 50 percent worse than in the corresponding period last year.My arguments with the boss got worse and worse, and it all culminated in my deciding to change jobs.
